pageContext.claim: “The terrorist came into our country through what is called the 'Diversity Visa Lottery Program,' a Chuck Schumer beauty. I want merit based.”
pageContext.analysis: Schumer did advocate for the diversity visa program in 1990, but Trump’s tweets entirely miss the context in which the program was created (mainly to help the Irish). Moreover, Schumer he helped craft a bill that would have eliminated it 23 years later.
